name: Kirby: Planet Robobot
synopsis: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble!
